public.defaultNLUConfig:
pipeline:
  - name: components.botfront.language_setter.LanguageSetter
  - name: tokenizer_whitespace
  - name: intent_featurizer_count_vectors
  - name: intent_classifier_tensorflow_embedding
  - BILOU_flag: true
    name: ner_crf
    features:
      - [low, title, upper]
      - [low, bias, prefix5, prefix2, suffix5, suffix3, suffix2, upper, title, digit, pattern]
      - [low, title, upper]
  - name: components.botfront.fuzzy_gazette.FuzzyGazette
  - name: ner_synonyms

private.defaultRules:
intent_substitutions:
  - intent: chitchat\.(.*)
    with: faq
    entities:
      add:
        - name: intent
          value: '{intent}'
  - intent: faq\.(.*)
    with: faq
    entities:
      add:
        - name: intent
          value: '{intent}'
disambiguation_policy:
  trigger: $0 > 1
  max_suggestions: 2
  display:
    text_template: utter_disamb_text
    button_title_template_prefix: utter_disamb
    fallback_button:
      title: utter_fallback_yes
      payload: /fallback
    exclude:
      - chitchat\..*
      - basics\..*
      - cancel
private.defaultEndpoints:
nlu:
  url: http://nlu:5000
  project: {BF_PROJECT_ID}
action_endpoint:
  url: http://actions:5055/webhook
nlu_models_info:
  url: http://botfront-api:8080/project/{BF_PROJECT_ID}/models/published
rules:
  url: http://botfront-api:8080/project/{BF_PROJECT_ID}/rules
tracker_store:
  store_type: botfront.tracker_stores.analytics.AnalyticsTrackerStore
  url: http://botfront-api:8080
  project_id: {BF_PROJECT_ID}
private.defaultPolicies:
policies:
  - name: AugmentedMemoizationPolicy
  - name: KerasPolicy
  - name: MappingPolicy
